targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
  rate(quic_transport_connection_handle_requests_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", request="push"}[$period]),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  rate(quic_transport_connection_handle_requests_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", request="rpc"}[$period]),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  rate(quic_transport_connection_handle_errors_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", request="push"}[$period]),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  quic_transport_connection_handle_errors_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", request="rpc"},
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  quic_transport_request_handle_errors_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", stream="bidi"},
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  quic_transport_request_handle_errors_total{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance", stream="uni"},
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)

label_replace(
label_replace(
  quic_transport_request_handler_tokio_task_instrumented_count{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance"} - 
  quic_transport_request_handler_tokio_task_dropped_count{job="replica", ic="$ic", ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet", instance=~"$instance"},
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)
